full_text: Who came up with the segment question “Are LaMelo Ball’s days numbered in Charlotte?” It’s the end of his second season! SMDH @FirstTake
For @dpalm66 and anyone else who loves Macho and/or Wrasslin  https://t.co/iU2BIzEOoM

I wish I could remove Mad Dog Sports from my SiriusXM radio package. Their hosts like this fill-in for Steve Torre and Torre himself always take the side of management, talk tough and blame the players.
